arStrings.szText: (PH) Each enemy {c_important}Leech Harvest{/c} latches onto grants you a {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%+|]{/c} bonus to your two highest Core Stats for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds.

(PH) {c_important}Leech Harvest{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%+|]{/c} bonus Poison Resistance and {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c} Maximum Poison Resistance for {c_number}[{SF_2}]{/c} seconds. While you are Poisoned each leech applies {c_number}{dot:POISON_DOT}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[{buffduration:POISON_DOT}]{/c} seconds to its host.
(PH) {c_important}Leech Harvest's{/c} damage is doubled for every {c_number}20%{/c} of the host's Current Life, up to {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_MAX_IMPACT}{/c} damage.
